entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
